content:
Note: Approved Change Requests from Security have been applied to continuous build
GF#20328 There+is+a+large+overlap+between+agent.type+and+agent.role. (Jean-Henri Duteau) Not Persuasive with Mod
GF#19410 Provenance+activity+type+value+set+is+still+broken (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive
GF#19755 AuditEvent+query+parameter+for+purposeOfUse (John Moehrke) Persuasive
GF#20536 AuditEvent+dicom+mapping+-+agent.type+and+agent.role (John Moehrke) Persuasive
GF#19644 AuditEvent+should+be+more+clear+in+scope+and+definition+as+generic+to+any+audit+event (John Moehrke) Persuasive with Mod
GF#20365 Add+short+description+and+references+to+consent-based+OAuth%2FUMA+and+cascaded+authorization (Mohammad Jafari) Persuasive with Mod
